title: Netflix Wants to Buy Warner Bros to Grow Bigger
summary: Netflix is trying to buy Warner Bros, a big movie and TV company. The boss of Netflix, Ted Sarandos, says their plan is better than another company called Paramount, which also wants to buy Warner Bros. Netflix wants to buy parts of Warner Bros to add new movies and shows, which helps the business grow. Paramount wants to buy all of Warner Bros, but Netflix thinks that might make the industry smaller. Netflix says they create jobs and spend money on new shows, like in the UK. Warner Bros has given Paramount a deadline to make their best offer before a vote next month. This is about which company will own Warner Bros and how it affects movies and TV.

background_read: This article is about two big companies, Netflix and Paramount, both wanting to buy Warner Bros, which is a famous movie and TV studio. Netflix is a streaming service that people use to watch shows online, and Warner Bros makes popular movies and series. When companies try to buy each other, it's called a takeover bid. Netflix's boss argues that their offer is better because it will help the movie industry grow by adding new content, while Paramount's offer might reduce the number of studios. This is important because it affects what movies and shows we can watch in the future.

WHY: To decide which company will own Warner Bros and how it affects the movie and TV industry's size and future.
